channel.description: Recent content in GraphRAG on ArangoDB Documentation

item.title: How to use GraphRAG in the ArangoDB Platform web interface
item.description: ArangoDB Platform The ArangoDB Platform & GenAI Suite is available as a pre-release. To get exclusive early access, get in touch  with the ArangoDB team. The GraphRAG workflow in the web interface The entire process is organized into sequential steps within a Project: Creating the importer service Uploading your file and exploring the generated Knowledge Graph Creating the retriever service Chatting with your Knowledge Graph Create a GraphRAG project To create a new GraphRAG project using the ArangoDB Platform web interface, follow these steps:

item.title: GraphRAG Notebook Tutorial
item.description: ArangoDB Platform The ArangoDB Platform & GenAI Suite is available as a pre-release. To get exclusive early access, get in touch  with the ArangoDB team. Tutorial overview This tutorial guides you through the process of building a Graph-based Retrieval Augmented Generation (GraphRAG) pipeline using ArangoDB’s integrated Notebook servers. GraphRAG is an advanced framework that combines the power of knowledge graphs (KGs) and large language models (LLMs) to provide precise and contextually relevant responses from unstructured text data.
